name: BNNS.FusedNormalizationParameters
desc: A structure that contains the parameters for a fused normalization layer.

items.name: init(type: BNNS.NormalizationType, beta: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor?, gamma: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor?, momentum: Float, epsilon: Float, activation: BNNS.ActivationFunction)
items.desc: Returns a new fused normalization parameters structure.

items.name: var type: BNNS.NormalizationType
items.desc: An enumeration that specifies the normalization type.

items.name: var momentum: Float
items.desc: A value, between 0 and 1, the normalization operation uses to update the moving mean and moving variance during training.

items.name: var epsilon: Float
items.desc: The epsilon in the computation of the standard deviation.

items.name: var activation: BNNS.ActivationFunction
items.desc: The activation function that the layer applies to the output.
